text: Mufti Dr Ismail Menk is a leading global Islamic scholar raised in Mozambique and born in Zimbabwe. He studied Shariah in Madinah and holds a Doctorate of Social Guidance from Aldersgate University. Mufti Menk’s work has gained worldwide recognition and he has been named one of “The Top 50 Most Influential Muslims in the World” since 2010. He has 100s of followers across his social media platforms. His personable style and down to earth approach has made him one of the most sought after scholars in our time. He has endeared himself to people with his much loved lecture series, a Mufti Menk hallmark. Mufti travels the world spreading a simple but profound message: “Do good, help others while preparing for the Hereafter”. He is active in the international arena and is a strong proponent of peace and justice, speaking up against all forms of terror. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Mufti Menk's Official Website * Mufti Ismail Menk's YouTube Channel Category:Living people Category:Imams Category:Quran reciters Category:Muslim scholars Category:Islamic University of Madinah alumni Category:1975 births Category:People who memorized the Quran
